caption.title: Agro-IBIS simulated maize yield (Mg ha -1) as driven with CRU data and output from all six GCMs for 1951â€“2005, and maize yield surveyed by USDA.
caption.p: Simulated values are averaged over all grid cells in the model domain, and county level observations are averaged over a region corresponding to the model domain. Error bars indicate the range of yield across grid cells (for model simulation) and counties (for survey).
